

I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select configuration_key as cfgKey, configuration_value as cfgValue
                          from product_type_layout;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select value
            from sessions
            where sesskey = '7d3mrroanedkucfp333uu3voo7'
            and expiry > '1354787070';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select template_dir from template_select where template_language in (2, 0) order by template_language DESC;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select banners_id, date_scheduled
                      from banners
                      where date_scheduled != 'NULL';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select b.banners_id, b.expires_date, b.expires_impressions,
                             sum(bh.banners_shown) as banners_shown
                      from banners b, banners_history bh
                      where b.status = 1
                      and b.banners_id = bh.banners_id
                      group by b.banners_id, b.expires_date, b.expires_impressions;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select specials_id, products_id
                       from specials
                       where status = '0'
                       and (((specials_date_available <= 20121206 and specials_date_available != '0001-01-01') and (expires_date > 20121206))
                       or ((specials_date_available <= 20121206 and specials_date_available != '0001-01-01') and (expires_date = '0001-01-01'))
                       or (specials_date_available = '0001-01-01' and expires_date > 20121206))
                       ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select specials_id, products_id
                       from specials
                       where status = '1'
                       and (20121206 < specials_date_available and specials_date_available != '0001-01-01')
                       ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select specials_id, products_id
                       from specials
                       where status = '1'
                       and ((20121206 >= expires_date and expires_date != '0001-01-01')
                       or (20121206 < specials_date_available and specials_date_available != '0001-01-01'));



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select featured_id
                       from featured
                       where status = '0'
                       and (((featured_date_available <= 20121206 and featured_date_available != '0001-01-01') and (expires_date > 20121206))
                       or ((featured_date_available <= 20121206 and featured_date_available != '0001-01-01') and (expires_date = '0001-01-01'))
                       or (featured_date_available = '0001-01-01' and expires_date > 20121206))
                       ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select featured_id
                       from featured
                       where status = '1'
                       and (20121206 < featured_date_available and featured_date_available != '0001-01-01')
                       ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select featured_id
                       from featured
                       where status = '1'
                       and ((20121206 >= expires_date and expires_date != '0001-01-01')
                       or (20121206 < featured_date_available and featured_date_available != '0001-01-01'));



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select sale_id
                       from salemaker_sales
                       where sale_status = '0'
                       and (((sale_date_start <= 20121206 and sale_date_start != '0001-01-01') and (sale_date_end > 20121206))
                       or ((sale_date_start <= 20121206 and sale_date_start != '0001-01-01') and (sale_date_end = '0001-01-01'))
                       or (sale_date_start = '0001-01-01' and sale_date_end > 20121206))
                       ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select sale_id
                       from salemaker_sales
                       where sale_status = '1'
                       and (20121206 < sale_date_start and sale_date_start != '0001-01-01')
                       ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select sale_id
                       from salemaker_sales
                       where sale_status = '1'
                       and ((20121206 >= sale_date_end and sale_date_end != '0001-01-01')
                       or (20121206 < sale_date_start and sale_date_start != '0001-01-01'));



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select configuration_value from configuration where configuration_key='ADMIN_DEMO';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select * from admin where admin_name='demo' or admin_name='Admin';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT admin_id from admin
          WHERE admin_id = 3
          AND admin_profile = 1;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT ip_address from admin_activity_log LIMIT 1;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select code, title, symbol_left, symbol_right, decimal_point,
                                         thousands_point, decimal_places, value
                                  from currencies;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select languages_id, name, code, image, directory
                               from languages order by sort_order;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT project_version_major, project_version_minor FROM project_version WHERE project_version_key = 'Zen-Cart Database';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select configuration_value from configuration where configuration_key='MODULE_PAYMENT_INSTALLED';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select configuration_value from configuration where configuration_key='MODULE_SHIPPING_INSTALLED';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select * from coupon_gv_queue where release_flag='N';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT menu_key, language_key FROM admin_menus ORDER BY sort_order;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT admin_id from admin
          WHERE admin_id = 3
          AND admin_profile = 1;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT * FROM product_types WHERE type_handler != 'product';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT ap.menu_key, ap.page_key, ap.main_page, ap.page_params, ap.language_key as page_name
          FROM admin_pages ap
          LEFT JOIN admin_menus am ON am.menu_key = ap.menu_key WHERE ap.display_on_menu = 'Y' ORDER BY am.sort_order, ap.sort_order;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select query_name, query_string from query_builder where query_category like '%email%';



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select customers_email_address, customers_firstname, customers_lastname from customers order by customers_lastname, customers_firstname, customers_email_address ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select customers_firstname, customers_lastname, customers_email_address from customers where customers_newsletter = '1' ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select o.date_purchased, c.customers_email_address, c.customers_lastname, c.customers_firstname from customers c, orders o WHERE c.customers_id = o.customers_id AND c.customers_newsletter = 1 GROUP BY c.customers_email_address HAVING max(o.date_purchased) <= subdate(now(),INTERVAL 3 MONTH) ORDER BY c.customers_lastname, c.customers_firstname ASC ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select c.customers_email_address, c.customers_lastname, c.customers_firstname from customers c, orders o where c.customers_newsletter = '1' AND c.customers_id = o.customers_id and o.date_purchased > subdate(now(),INTERVAL 3 MONTH) GROUP BY c.customers_email_address order by c.customers_lastname, c.customers_firstname ASC ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select c.customers_email_address, c.customers_lastname, c.customers_firstname from customers c, orders o WHERE c.customers_id = o.customers_id and o.date_purchased > subdate(now(),INTERVAL 3 MONTH) GROUP BY c.customers_email_address order by c.customers_lastname, c.customers_firstname ASC ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select 'ADMIN' as customers_firstname, admin_name as customers_lastname, admin_email as customers_email_address from admin where admin_id = 3 ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT DISTINCT c.customers_email_address as customers_email_address, c.customers_lastname as customers_lastname, c.customers_firstname as customers_firstname FROM customers c LEFT JOIN  orders o ON c.customers_id=o.customers_id WHERE o.date_purchased IS NULL ;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select customers_email_address, customers_firstname, customers_lastname from customers WHERE customers_email_format != 'NONE' order by customers_lastname, customers_firstname, customers_email_address;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
SELECT * from project_version WHERE project_version_key = 'Zen-Cart Database' ORDER BY project_version_date_applied DESC LIMIT 1;



I AM HERE 
sidebox: 

Explain 
select count(*) as total
            from sessions
            where sesskey = '7d3mrroanedkucfp333uu3voo7';
